entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 11:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

Visibility: 16 km

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 in the evening then becoming west 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:55 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
